oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Coster Shops Seniority List, 1947
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Seniority List of Car Repairers, Car Repairers’ Helpers, Car Repairers’ Apprentices, Painters, Painters Helpers, Upholsterers, Coach Cleaners. Coster Shops of Southern Railroad, Knoxville, Tenn. 1947. Brotherhood Railway Carmen of America. 15 pp. Front cover. Only the names of employees are listed in the Full Text field; consult the image of the page for dates.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Railroad employees; Railroad employees' unions;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Loaned for copying and returned to owner; McClung Collection does not own a copy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
